title: Monophenyl luminescent material with dual-state emission and pH sensitivity for cell imaging
content:
RSC Adv., 2024, 14,10942-10952
DOI: 10.1039/D4RA01422G, Paper
Open Access
Â  This article is licensed under a Creative Commons Attribution-NonCommercial 3.0 Unported Licence.
Yuxin Jin, Bingli Jiang, Huajian Song, Chanming Mei, Zuoan Liu, Xiakai Zhang, Jinyuan Liu, Yongyang Gong
A novel probe, called DMSS-AM, has been synthesized to be pH-sensitive and target lysosomes. It exhibits efficient emission in both solution and solid states, overcoming the limitations of AIE and ACQ fluorescent probes.
